name: Long Story Short
description:
A short RPG story about a soul arriving in purgatory and needing to find its way to the etheral station, where it can pass on to the afterlife.

Meet characters, take in visuals and hopefully you'll enjoy the little romp I put together.

Small content warning for suicide references.

You can increae the size of the screen with F6 and dash with Shift.

Additional credits go to:

Zeus81, Zerbu, Adrian Von Ziegler, turkeyDawg, Scythuz, Soulse, Brennfett, Bryly Medina, Tiago Feliz.
